rooms.name: Lobby/Entrance
rooms.description: A spacious entrance area with natural lighting and ventilation, designed to welcome guests while maintaining privacy.

rooms.name: Open-Plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: Large open space combining kitchen and living area that adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring proper sunlight and energy flow. Brutalist design is maintained with raw concrete finishes and geometric forms.

rooms.name: Guest Room 1
rooms.description: A guest room designed for joint family visitors with essential furniture and minimalistic decor, adhering to local building norms.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom on the ground floor with built-in storage and a direct view of Vastu auspicious direction. The design uses robust concrete walls typical in Brutalist style.

openings.description: Provides additional ventilation and connection to the open-plan area.
